items.answer: We accommodate both small and large volume orders, with flexible manufacturing capabilities for 50-10,000 units depending on component complexity.
items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks, with expedited options available for urgent requirements. Actual timeline depends on component complexity and quantity.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We are ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certified, ensuring consistent high-quality manufacturing processes and environmental management.
items.question: What quality certifications do you have?

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper, providing comprehensive material solutions for diverse industrial applications.
items.question: What materials can you work with?

items.answer: Yes, we provide complete custom manufacturing services, working closely with clients to develop precise, application-specific components.

aboutusintro.title: About Momai Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Uncompromising Quality
aboutusintro.description: Founded in Rajkot, Momai Brass has been a leading precision components manufacturer for three decades. We specialize in producing high-quality parts for automotive, pneumatic, and electrical sectors using advanced CNC technology. Our commitment to excellence and innovation drives us to deliver superior manufacturing solutions.

items.name: Rajesh Patel
items.content: Momai Brass consistently delivers exceptional precision components. Their technical expertise and commitment to quality have been crucial to our manufacturing process.

items.name: Sameer Mehta
items.content: Outstanding precision and reliability. Momai Brass has been our trusted manufacturing partner for complex pneumatic components.
